document.heading: Insurance Holding Company and Credit for Reinsurance Modernization Amendment Act of 2014

history.narrative: Law 20-235, the “Insurance Holding Company and Credit for Reinsurance Modernization Amendment Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-537. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Oct. 28, 2014, and Nov. 18, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Jan. 6, 2015, it was assigned Act No. 20-559 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-235 became effective on Mar. 11, 2015.
